Token.Abstract: The A2BlockDelegate category extends features provided by A2DynamicDelegate to create custom block properties in a category on a delegating object and dynamically map them to delegate (UIAlertViewDelegate), data source (UITableViewDataSource), or other delegated protocol (NSErrorRecoveryAttempting) methods.
Synthesizes multiple properties and links them to the appropriate selector in the data source protocol.

Parameter.Name: selectorsForPropertyNames
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary with property names as keys and selector strings as objects.

Token.Abstract: Synthesizes multiple properties and links them to the appropriate selector in the delegate protocol.

Parameter.Name: selectorsForPropertyNames
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary with property names as keys and selectors strings as objects.

Token.Abstract: Synthesizes multiple properties and links them to the appropriate selector in the given protocol.

Parameter.Name: protocol
Parameter.Abstract: A protocol that declares all of the given selectors. Must not be NULL.

Parameter.Name: selectorsForPropertyNames
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary with property names as keys and selector strings as objects.

Token.Abstract: Registers a dynamic data source replacement using the property name dataSource and the protocol name FooBarDataSource for an instance of FooBar.
Registers a dynamic delegate replacement using the property name delegate and the protocol name FooBarDelegate for an instance of FooBar.
Registers a dynamic data source replacement using the given property name and the protocol name FooBarDataSource for an instance of FooBar.

Parameter.Name: dataSourceName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the class' data source property. Must not be nil.

Token.Abstract: Registers a dynamic delegate replacement using the given property name and the protocol name FooBarDelegate for an instance of FooBar.

Parameter.Name: delegateName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the class' delegate property. Must not be nil.

Token.Abstract: Registers a dynamic protocol implementation replacement using the given property name and the given protocol.

Parameter.Name: delegateName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the class' delegation protocol property, such as safeDelegate. Must not be nil.

Parameter.Name: protocol
Parameter.Abstract: A properly encoded protocol. Must not be NULL.
